parts.text: Give me the maximum scrabble score for the word Xylophone as compared to the word Rabblerouser.

functionDeclarations.name: get_max_scrabble_word_score
functionDeclarations.description: Returns the maximum score for a given word in the game Scrabble (tm)

functionDeclarations.name: get_is_known_word
functionDeclarations.description: Returns true or false, indicating whether the candidate string is actually a word listed in the dictionary.
